Hi {!Tour_Outcome__c.Tour_With_First_Name__c},
Thanks for your interest in WeWork, the community for creators.
We're thrilled that you're thinking about becoming a member and look forward to showing you around.
You're all set for a tour at {!Tour_Outcome__c.Building_No_City__c} on {!Tour_Outcome__c.Tour_Date__c} at {!Tour_Outcome__c.Start_Time__c}! You can find us at {!Tour_Outcome__c.Location_Address__c}.
See you soon!
VALERIE BATISTA Director of Sales joinus@wework.com 855.593.9675
